title: Easter hot cross buns
ingredients: ['For the buns', '500g strong bread flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '75g caster sugar', '300ml milk', '55g butter', '1 (7g) sachet active dried yeast', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '50g currants or sultanas', '2 tablespoons orange zest', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '1/2 teaspooon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons Belgian pearl sugar', 'For the cross and glaze', '50g plain flour', '2 to 3 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons apricot jam, warmed']
